summary: A collection of Alembic migration scripts that define incremental upgrades and downgrades to the Knowledge Repo database schema, handling additions, renames, and modifications of tables, columns, indexes, and constraints to support new application features.
business_intent: Enable controlled evolution of the application's relational database, allowing developers to apply and revert structural changes safely as the product introduces capabilities such as external authentication, groupâ€‘based permissions, error logging, and performance optimizations.
